scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "pnpm run db:start" "wait-on tcp:5432 && pnpm run dev"
scripts.db:start: docker run --name secret_send_db -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres POSTGRES_DB=secret_send -p 5432:5432 postgres
scripts.db:stop: docker stop secret_send_db && docker rm secret_send_db
scripts.db:reset: docker exec -it secret_send_db psql -U postgres -c 'DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS secret_send'
